info.title: SQL Server
info.description: Microsoft SQL Server is a relational database management system developed by Microsoft. Connect to SQL Server to manage data. You can perform various actions such as create, update, get, and delete on rows in a table.

get.description: Get datasets metadata.
This operation gets metadata for a stored procedure.
This operation gets metadata for a stored procedure.

post.summary: Get pass-through native SQL query metadata
post.description: Retrieves metadata for a pass-through native SQL query.

get.description: This operation gets metadata for a table.
Get table metadata for 'get' operation.
Get table metadata for 'patch' operation.
Get table metadata for 'post' operation.
List the databases

get.summary: Lists datasets exposed by the connection
get.description: Lists datasets exposed by the connection
This operation gets stored procedures for a database.

post.description: This operation runs a stored procedure.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Input parameters to the stored procedure

get.description: This operation gets rows from a table.

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: A sequence of OData aggregation transformations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

post.description: This operation inserts a new row into a table.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row to insert into the specified table

get.description: This operation gets a row from a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to retrieve

delete.description: This operation deletes a row from a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to delete

patch.description: This operation updates an existing row in a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to update

get.description: Triggers a flow when an item is created in SQL

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

parameters.name: x-ms-operation-context
parameters.description: Special header to enable operation simulation

post.description: Retrieves metadata for a Power Query. Note: This operation does not work when connecting using SQL Azure AD.
Retrieves metadata for a Power Query. Note: This operation does not work when connecting using SQL Azure AD.
Transform data using Power Query. Note: This operation does not work when connecting using SQL Azure AD.
Transform data using Power Query. Note: This operation does not work when connecting using SQL Azure AD.

Name.description: The name of the database. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the database.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional database properties provided by the connector to the clients.

DynamicTreeOpenBrowse.description: Dynamic tree open and browse objects schema

selectedItemPlaceholder.description: Selected item placeholder in the path

NoNaturalKeyColumnConnectorMetadata.description: No natural key column connector metadata property

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution

PassThroughNativeQueryBody.description: Input body to execute Pass-through Native Query (PNQ)

PassThroughNativeQueryMetadata.description: Represents the metadata for a pass-through native query

OutputParameters.description: Output parameter values. The schema is dynamic based on the procedure.

ResultSets.description: Result sets returned by a procedure. The schema is dynamic based on the procedure.

Name.description: The name of the server. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the server.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional server properties provided by the connector to the clients.

SqlPassThroughNativeQueryBody.description: Input body to execute Pass-through Native Query (PNQ)

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

PassThroughPQBody.description: Input body to execute Pass-through Native Query (PNQ)
